articles.title: Netflix Starts Testing Timer Feature to Stop Streaming Content After a Certain Period - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Netflix has started testing a new feature that will allow viewers to set a timer for their favourite show or movie. The new feature is currently live for select Netflix subscribers on Android devices globally.
